start.descCircumstances: was made to help users who download media for circumstances that requires offline usage.
start.descPhilosophyExpl: , get it when you want to read/watch it.
start.descDocumentation: Read the "how to use" documentation at hakuneko.download (link available in the menu)
start.instructionsTitle: Find a site to get the content you want to view
start.instDisclaimer: is not hosting anything. Find a website on the internet that provides the content you want. Then:
start.instConnector: Select your connector (the website). Use the filters
start.titleConnector: Select a website from which the manga list should be shown
start.instRefresh: Click on the refresh button (can take minutes)
start.titleFind: Filter the manga list by their titles
start.titleFilter: Select a language to filter the chapter list
start.titleSelect: Filter the chapter list by their titles
start.faqMissingConn: The connector you are looking for is not in the list?
start.faqAnsMissingConn: 👉 Create a website request on the github (issue)
start.faqCopyPaste: Use the copy/paste feature if you already have the manga link
start.end: Download, view, bookmark your favorite mangas 📚

frontend.label: Frontend ⁽¹⁾
frontend.description:
Select the UI frontend that should be used for the manga download engine.

⁽¹⁾ Restart required to take affect

language.label: Language ⁽¹⁾
language.description:
Select the language that should be used for the manga download engine.

⁽¹⁾ Restart required to take affect

readerEnabled.label: Enable Reader
readerEnabled.description: Show a preview panel and a basic reader for the chapters

baseDirectory.label: Manga Directory
baseDirectory.description: The base directory where all downloaded mangas will be stored

bookmarkDirectory.label: Bookmarks Directory
bookmarkDirectory.description:
The directory where the bookmark and chaptermark files will be stored.
This setting has no effect when the application is in portable mode!

chapterTitleFormat.label: Chapter Title Format
chapterTitleFormat.description:
Define the chapter name format.
This is an experimental feature, volume/chapter numbers are extracted directly from the original name.
May fail in some cases and also reduce performance!

Supported placeholders:
  %C% - Connector title
  %M% - Manga title
  %VOL% - Volume number
  %CH% - Chapter number
  %T% - Chapter title (without volume/chapter number)
  %O% - Chapter title (original)

chapterFormat.label: Chapter File Format
chapterFormat.description: Store chapters in the selected file format

recompressionFormat.label: De-Scrambling Format
recompressionFormat.description:
Select the re-compression format that shall be used for scrambled images.
Only applies to scrambled images!
Unscrambled images are stored natively (no re-compression will be applied).

recompressionQuality.label: De-Scrambling Quality
recompressionQuality.description:
Select the re-compression quality that shall be used for scrambled images.
Only applies to WEBP and JPEG, has no effect on PNG (which is lossless).

useSequentialMediaDownloads.label: Disable Concurrent Downloads
useSequentialMediaDownloads.description: Media will be downloaded one after another instead of concurrently. Enable this in case of holding a slow internet connection, or regularly encountering failed downloads due to network errors.

proxyRules.label: Proxy Rules
proxyRules.description:
Set the proxy servers that shall be used.
Leave blank to ignore.

Examples:
  http=proxy.web:80
  http=127.0.0.1:8080;https=127.0.0.1:8080;socks=127.0.0.1:8081

More info: https://git.io/hakuneko-proxy

proxyAuth.label: Proxy Authentication
proxyAuth.description:
Set the username and password for the proxy server(s).
Use ":" as separator between both terms.
Only basic auth is supported!

Examples:
  username:password

hCaptchaAccessibilityUUID.label: hCaptcha UUID
hCaptchaAccessibilityUUID.description:
Provide your accessibility UUID for hCaptcha (CloudFlare protection).
Therefore CloudFlare may only show a click box instead of an image challenge.
Signup for accessibility by registering an email on https://cutt.ly/hcaptcha-signup
Copy the UUID part from the verification link in the received confirmation mail.

Example:
  68e89cc3-4c2d-4539-b80b-49ba4bec76c4

More info: https://www.hcaptcha.com/accessibility

downloadHistoryLogFormat.label: Download History Format
downloadHistoryLogFormat.description:
Log the history of completed chapter downloads.
The log file(s) can be found in HakuNeko's user data directory.

postChapterDownloadCommand.label: Post Command
postChapterDownloadCommand.description:
This command will be executed after a chapter download is complete.
The working directory is the folder containing the downloaded chapter.
Leave blank to ignore.

Supported placeholders:
  %PATH% - Path to downloaded chapter folder/file
  %C% - Connector title
  %M% - Manga title
  %O% - Chapter title

Examples:
  convert "%PATH%\*.webp" -scene 1 "%PATH%\%03d.png"
  md "%O%_conv" & convert "%PATH%\*.*" -scene 1 "%O%_conv\%03d.png"

discordPresence.label: Discord Presence
discordPresence.description:
Provides what you are currently reading as discord activity
information to the public.

NovelColorProfiles.label: Light/Dark mode for Novels
NovelColorProfiles.description:
Choose between light and dark mode for novels.
This changes the image itself not just the reader view.
This may not work for all connectors that support novels.

path.label: Manga Folder
path.description:
A local directory from which mangas can be shown within HakuNeko with the  【Folder Viewer】 connector
The directory only works with top-level manga folders, nested manga folders are not supported!
The manga folders must also contain their chapters in the top-level!

format.label: Image Format
format.description: In general JPEG is considered for premium users, however in some mangas JPEG might still work.

quality.label: Image Quality
quality.description: High quality seems to be restricted, probably for premium only.

format.label: Image Format
format.description: In general JPEG is considered for premium users, however in some mangas JPEG might still work.

quality.label: Image Quality
quality.description: High quality seems to be restricted, probably for premium only.

resolution.label: Preferred Resolution
resolution.description:
Try to download video in the selected resolution.
If the resolution is not supported, depending on the mirror the download may fail, or a fallback resolution may be used!

throttle.label: Video Stream Throttle [ms]
throttle.description:
Enter the timespan in [ms] to delay consecuitive HTTP requests while downloading packets from the video stream.
The download may fail if there are too many packets requested within a certain interval.

resolution.label: Preferred Resolution
resolution.description:
Try to download video in the selected resolution.
If the resolution is not supported, depending on the mirror the download may fail, or a fallback resolution may be used!

throttle.label: Video Stream Throttle [ms]
throttle.description:
Enter the timespan in [ms] to delay consecuitive HTTP requests while downloading packets from the video stream.
The download may fail if there are too many packets requested within a certain interval.

url.label: URL
url.description:
This website's main domain doesn't always work, but has alternate domains.
This is the default URL which can also be manually set by the user.

quality.label: Preferred format
quality.description:
format of images
webp (low)
jpg (medium)
png (high))

format.label: Image Format
format.description: In general JPEG is considered for premium users, however in some mangas JPEG might still work.

quality.label: Image Quality
quality.description: High quality seems to be restricted, probably for premium only.

throttle.label: Throttle Requests [ms]
throttle.description:
Enter the timespan in [ms] to delay consecuitive HTTP requests.
The website may block images for to many consecuitive requests.

scrapeDelay.label: Page Scrape Delay
scrapeDelay.description:
Time to wait until the page initialization process is complete.
Increase the value if no pages are found for the chapter.

url.label: URL
url.description:
This website changes their URL regularly.
This is the last known URL which can also be manually set by the user.

device.label: Device
device.description: Select what device should be pretended when connecting to Crunchyroll.

locale.label: Locale
locale.description:

Localized media will be preferred, if unavailable use English (US).

username.description:

Enter the timespan in [ms] to delay consecuitive HTTP requests.
The website may reject to many consecuitive requests
